title: How to Easily Defeat the Final Boss in Resident Evil 4

steps.headline: Once the battle starts, shoot one of the leg eyes with the Striker.
Instead of pressing A (Or X) to climb up on him and stab the main eye, shoot it with the Striker, then quickly climb up on him.
Run a little past the explosive barrel and shoot it when he gets close to it.
Now climb up on the platform and when he gets close to it, hit the switch and repeat step 2.
Get to the other side via the bridge.
Repeat the red barrel and switch steps.
Throw one at him; when it explodes, repeat step 2.
Keep repeating step 9 until Ada throws the Special Rocket Launcher at you.
steps.description: Do not use the Special Rocket Launcher yet!

steps.headline: Repeat the grenade step one more time, but shoot the eye with the normal Rocket Launcher.
After the cut scene, grab the Special Launcher and beat the game.

text: Once the battle starts, shoot one of the leg eyes with the Striker.  Instead of pressing A (Or X) to climb up on him and stab the main eye, shoot it with the Striker, then quickly climb up on him.  Run a little past the explosive barrel and shoot it when he gets close to it.  Repeat step 2.  Now climb up on the platform and when he gets close to it, hit the switch and repeat step 2.  Get to the other side via the bridge.  Repeat the red barrel and switch steps.  Now equip the grenades.  Throw one at him; when it explodes, repeat step 2.  Keep repeating step 9 until Ada throws the Special Rocket Launcher at you. Do not use the Special Rocket Launcher yet! Repeat the grenade step one more time, but shoot the eye with the normal Rocket Launcher.  After the cut scene, grab the Special Launcher and beat the game.
